name: OrcaToken

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership
ERC20Basic

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
attributes.name: ERC20
SafeERC20

attributes.documentation: @return the name of the token
attributes.name: name

attributes.documentation: @return the symbol of the token
attributes.name: symbol

attributes.documentation: @return the granularity of the token
attributes.name: granularity

attributes.documentation: @return the total supply of the token
attributes.name: totalSupply
balanceOf

attributes.documentation:
@notice Return the list of default operators
 @return the list of all the default operators
attributes.name: defaultOperators
send

attributes.documentation:
@notice Authorize a third party `_operator` to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Authorized
attributes.name: authorizeOperator

attributes.documentation:
@notice Revoke a third party `_operator`'s rights to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Revoked
attributes.name: revokeOperator
isOperatorFor
operatorSend

attributes.documentation:
@notice Internal function that ensures `_amount` is multiple of the granularity
 @param _amount The quantity that want's to be checked
attributes.name: requireMultiple
isRegularAddress
doSend
doBurn
callRecipient
callSender
erc20

attributes.documentation:
@notice For Backwards compatibility
 @return The decimls of the token. Forced to 18 in ERC777.
attributes.name: decimals
transfer
transferFrom
approve
allowance

attributes.documentation: @notice Constructor to create a OrcaToken

@notice Disables the ERC20 interface. This function can only be called
  by the owner.
attributes.name: disableERC20

attributes.documentation:
@notice Re enables the ERC20 interface. This function can only be called
  by the owner.
attributes.name: enableERC20

@return True if the operation was successful.
